title: $88 -- Opéra de Montréal's 'Elektra' incl. Cocktail, 30% Off
text:
Thank you for updating your zip code Opéra de Montréal 
The one-act opera, "Elektra," composed by Richard Strauss and based on Greek mythology, comes to the Opéra de Montréal this November, and Travelzoo members can save 30% on tickets . 
The following seating sections are available for the Saturday performances on Nov. 21 & 28 at 7:30 p.m., and include a cocktail voucher for use before or after the show: Mid Orchestra and Dress Circle ... $87.95 (reg. $130.57) Front Orchestra ... $109.66 (reg. $156.02) 
The gruesome tale of a dysfunctional family, "Elektra," through " extravagant orchestration" (Montreal Gazette), tells the story of a woman banished from her father's palace after her mother and mother's lover have murdered him. Opéra de Montréal's 'Elektra' incl. Cocktail, $ $88 Saturday Nov. 21 & 28 at 7:30 p.m. $88 -- Opéra de Montréal's 'Elektra' incl. Cocktail, 30% Off * Tweet By Pamela Bartlett 
The one-act opera, "Elektra," composed by Richard Strauss and based on Greek mythology, comes to the Opéra de Montréal this November, and Travelzoo members can save 30% on tickets . 
The following seating sections are available for the Saturday performances on Nov. 21 & 28 at 7:30 p.m., and include a cocktail voucher for use before or after the show: Mid Orchestra and Dress Circle ... $87.95 (reg. $130.57) Front Orchestra ... $109.66 (reg. $156.02) 
The gruesome tale of a dysfunctional family, "Elektra," through " extravagant orchestration" (Montreal Gazette), tells the story of a woman banished from her father's palace after her mother and mother's lover have murdered him. Book by Nov. 23.
